ygData.subject: Creating a plugin that calls a webservice
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I created a webservice that executes javascript code of a given URL and gives a JSON object containing all the links found after the execution.

Hi everyone,
I created a webservice that executes javascript code of a give=
n URL and
gives a JSON object containing all the links found after the exec=
ution.
Now I need to create a Heritrix plugin (add-on, module) that tells
H=
eritrix, when an url pattern is matched, to call that webservice with
that =
url then to update the frontier with the links found in the JSON
response.
=
Unfortunately I am a newbie to Heritrix and I need some hints in order
to k=
now where to start and first steps to follow.

Thank you for your help.
